member.name: P:Group1hospitalproject.Areas.HelpPage.HelpPageSampleGenerator.SampleObjectFactories
member.summary: Gets factories for the objects that the supported formatters will serialize as samples. Processed in order, stopping when the factory successfully returns a non- object.
member.remarks: Collection includes just initially. Use SampleObjectFactories.Insert(0, func) to provide an override and SampleObjectFactories.Add(func) to provide a fallback.

member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:Group1hospitalproject.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: M:Group1hospitalproject.Controllers.ApplicationsDataController.ListApplications
member.summary: Returns all Applications in the system.
member.returns: HEADER: 200 (OK) CONTENT: all Applications in the database, including their associated jobs.

member.name: M:Group1hospitalproject.Controllers.ApplicationsDataController.ListApplicationforJobs(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gather information about all applications related to a particular jobs id

member.name: M:Group1hospitalproject.Controllers.ApplicationsDataController.FindApplication(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns all Applications in the system.
member.returns: HEADER: 200 (OK) CONTENT: An Applications in the system matching up to the Application ID primary key or HEADER: 404 (NOT FOUND)
member.param: The primary key of the Application

member.name: M:Group1hospitalproject.Controllers.ApplicationsDataController.UpdateApplication(System.Int32,Group1hospitalproject.Models.Application)
member.summary: Updates a particular Application in the system with POST Data input
member.param: Represents the Application ID primary key
JSON FORM DATA of an Application
member.returns: HEADER: 204 (Success, No Content Response) or HEADER: 400 (Bad Request) or HEADER: 404 (Not Found)
member.example: POST: api/ApplicationsData/UpdateApplication/5 FORM DATA: Application JSON Object

member.name: M:Group1hospitalproject.Controllers.ApplicationsDataController.AddApplication(Group1hospitalproject.Models.Application)
member.summary: Adds an application to the system
member.param: JSON FORM DATA of an application
member.returns: HEADER: 201 (Created) CONTENT: application ID, application Data or HEADER: 400 (Bad Request)
member.example: POST: api/ApplicationsData/AddApplication FORM DATA: application JSON Object

member.name: M:Group1hospitalproject.Controllers.ApplicationsDataController.DeleteApplication(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes an Application from the system by it's ID.
member.param: The primary key of the Application

member.name: M:Group1hospitalproject.Controllers.JobDataController.ListJobs
member.summary: Returns all jobs in the system.
member.returns: HEADER: 200 (OK) CONTENT: all jobs in the database, including their associated Applications.

member.summary: Returns all jobs in the system.
member.returns: HEADER: 200 (OK) CONTENT: A job in the system matching up to the job ID primary key or HEADER: 404 (NOT FOUND)
member.param: The primary key of the jobs

member.summary: Updates a particular Jobs in the system with POST Data input
member.param: Represents the Species ID primary key
JSON FORM DATA of an Job
member.returns: HEADER: 204 (Success, No Content Response) or HEADER: 400 (Bad Request) or HEADER: 404 (Not Found)
member.example: POST: api/JobData/Update/5 FORM DATA: jobs JSON Object

member.name: M:Group1hospitalproject.Controllers.JobDataController.AddJob(Group1hospitalproject.Models.Job)
member.summary: Adds an Job to the system
member.param: JSON FORM DATA of a Job
member.returns: HEADER: 201 (Created) CONTENT: Job ID, Job Data or HEADER: 400 (Bad Request)
member.example: POST: api/JobData/AddJob FORM DATA: Species JSON Object
